Failover IP Address

A Failover IP Address is the IP address weMessage will fallback on if your first IP address is unable to connect to your weServer (for example, if you have both a Public and Private IP address). \n\nIf you do not have multiple IP addresses, this can be left blank.
Password
Please enter your login details. Your email and password should match those set on your weServer.
You have exceeded the maximum chat icon size (%1$s). \n\nPlease choose a smaller photo.
Picture Too Large
You have exceeded the maximum attachment size (%1$s). \n\nThe attachments selected are too large to be sent.
Files Too Large
You have exceeded your carrier\'s maximum attachment size for SMS messages (%1$s). \n\nThe attachments selected are too be large to be compressed or sent.
An error occurred while trying to get media from the device.
The attachments are too large to be sent. \n\nPlease reduce your file sizes.

weMessage could not get your phone number. Since weMessage is your default messaging app, you must enter in your number in order for it to work.

Send as SMS
An unknown error occurred while trying to send an attachment.
An error occurred while trying to send a message.
You cannot send an SMS message if weMessage is not your default messaging app.
Currently, you can only send pictures in an SMS message. \n\nVoice and video attachments will be added in the future.
Set As Primary
weMessage cannot be your messaging app without the required permissions. \n\nPlease go into your Settings and grant weMessage any disabled permissions or change your default messaging app.
weMessage is your default messaging app but it does not have the right permissions. \n\nIn order to use weMessage, please grant it the permissions it asks for or change your default messaging app.
You did not choose weMessage as your default messaging app. If this was a mistake, then repeat the process.
Could not set weMessage as your messaging app because some of the permissions it needs were denied.
weMessage supports normal texting (SMS and MMS). If you want weMessage to be your default messaging app, click Continue. Otherwise, click Cancel, and SMS Mode will be disabled.
In order to make weMessage your default messaging app, you must grant it all of the permissions it asks for.
weMessage will also need your permission to access Settings in order to be able to send messages over mobile data. \n\nPress OK in order to allow this.
Login Help

Important: If you are having trouble setting up the weMessage\'s iMessage functionality or run into problems connecting to your weServer, please visit the setup page on our website for more help:\n\n https://wemessageapp.com/setup
Version: %1$s

This SMS chat is currently being synced with the messages on your phone. Please wait until the syncing process is finished before viewing this conversation.
SMS Mode
SMS Error
Start Process
Currently trying to connect to your weServer. Please wait before trying to perform this action.
Currently trying to connect to your weServer. Please wait before trying to send any messages.
Switch Account
Switch Accounts
Sync Contacts
Contact Sync will import the contacts from the Contact List on your phone. \n\nPlease make sure you give weMessage permission to read your contacts if it asks for it.
Could not perform Contact Sync because weMessage does not have permission to read your contacts.

Contact Sync will transfer the contacts on your computer to your weMessage Contacts List. \n\nThis process will take a while if you have a lot of contacts, so do not get disconnected from your weServer during the sync.
Contact Sync will import your contacts from a desired location. \n\nYou can sync your contacts with either your computer or the ones on your phone.
Make sure that Terminal has access to your Contacts (like Accessibility) in System Preferences, or the Sync will not work.
Perform Contact Sync
Sync with Mac
Sync with Phone
Take Photo

Could not connect to the weServer. Make sure it is turned on and you entered the right IP address! \n\nIf you set a custom port, insert a colon after the IP Address followed by the port (ip:port). If not, don\'t worry about this step.
Connection Timed Out
Show Blocked Contacts
Enable SMS Mode
Show Unblocked Contacts
Unsupported Attachments
What\'s New
Version 1.1 adds Contact Sync! To sync the contacts on your computer with weMessage, go into your weMessage Settings. \n\nIn addition, you are now able to view certain message effects.

Version 1.2 adds SMS and MMS messaging! If SMS Mode is not enabled, you can turn it on in your weMessage Settings. \n\nOther new features include Contact Sync with the contacts on your phone, a Contact List screen, Failover IP Addresses, revamped notifications, and much more!
